original_title: ShinyHunters breach Google using voice phishing attack | Fox News
article_summary:
Google Confirms Data Breach by ShinyHunters: Stolen Business Information from Google's Salesforce Database

Google has confirmed a data breach by the cybercriminal group ShinyHunters, with stolen data including business names and contact details from Google's corporate Salesforce system. The attack was carried out using voice phishing, or "vishing," and it is unclear if Google has received any ransom demand from the group.</s>
